attributes.action: keep all forms of cannabis as class C drugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There has recently been a lot of media speculation over the possible mental health issues concerning cannabis, the truth is though that research has given no concrete evidence for either viewpoint, further more the research that is done bears little relevance to the actual use of cannabis. Till concrete, and relevant evidence is found it makes little sense to reclass cannabis as a class B drug.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
